<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/d49a35a1c3b736637733b36011fccbee7ef43fcf|patch 8.2.2054: Amiga: FEAT_ARP defined when it should not>
patch 8.2.2054: Amiga: FEAT_ARP defined when it should not

Problem:    Amiga: FEAT_ARP defined when it should not.
Solution:   Adjust "||" to "&&" in #ifdef. (Ola Söder, closes #7375)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2054: Amiga: FEAT_ARP defined when it should not · vim/vim@d49a35a
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2054: Amiga: FEAT_ARP defined when it should not · vim/vim@d49a35a
attachments.text: Problem: Amiga: FEAT_ARP defined when it should not. Solution: Adjust "||" to "&&" in #ifdef. (Ola Söder, closes #7375)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/c2ca935d26b3fc64a13d4e7d0583fc787efe61d0|patch 8.2.2053: Vim9: lamba doesn't accept argument types>
patch 8.2.2053: Vim9: lamba doesn't accept argument types

Problem:    Vim9: lamba doesn't accept argument types.
Solution:   Optionally accept argument types at the script level.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2053: Vim9: lamba doesn't accept argument types · vim/vim@c2ca935
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2053: Vim9: lamba doesn't accept argument types · vim/vim@c2ca935
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: lamba doesn't accept argument types. Solution: Optionally accept argument types at the script level.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/47a2abf0bc3c3dac0433754ad0365ebad152df8c|patch 8.2.2052: Vim9: "edit +4 fname" gives an error>
patch 8.2.2052: Vim9: "edit +4 fname" gives an error

Problem:    Vim9: "edit +4 fname" gives an error. (Naruhiko Nishino)
Solution:   Allow using a range in the +cmd argument. (closes #7364)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2052: Vim9: "edit +4 fname" gives an error · vim/vim@47a2abf
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2052: Vim9: "edit +4 fname" gives an error · vim/vim@47a2abf
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: "edit +4 fname" gives an error. (Naruhiko Nishino) Solution: Allow using a range in the +cmd argument. (closes #7364)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/34c54eb6cbda5dbc14376c8b1c62ad11d4852793|patch 8.2.2051: Vim9: crash when aborting a user function call>
patch 8.2.2051: Vim9: crash when aborting a user function call

Problem:    Vim9: crash when aborting a user function call.
Solution:   Do not use the return value when aboring. (closes #7372)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2051: Vim9: crash when aborting a user function call · vim/vim@34c54eb
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2051: Vim9: crash when aborting a user function call · vim/vim@34c54eb
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: crash when aborting a user function call. Solution: Do not use the return value when aboring. (closes #7372)
